title: Lunar Revel
body: How long will the skins for the Lunar Revel be available for?

replies.body: ya i dont think any of the new lunar skins are legacy skins! so theyll be around all year long. But the bundles will probably only be here for at least a week maybe a little more!

actually all f them will be available all year long except Dragonblade riven And the Tryndamere skin they are available until feb 23.
just found this out.
ya i was mainly talking about the newer ones release this year. the Riven and Tyndamere skins are always going to be considered Legacy so theyll always leave after this event each year!
The ones for 2015 (Jinx, Kat and Nid) are permanent skins, the Legacy skins (Trynd, Riv and Ward skins) will last till February 23.  Jinx is also only 975 till the 16th.
The current ones Jinx, nid and kat are gonna be available after event they are not legacy but the others will probably go in legacy vault in a couple of weeks from now
so they will available for atleast a week?
From what i read jinx nid and kat skins are permanent trnd and riven skins will be available for a temp time, there will probably be a posting on the news page soon
